Review Text: I was at the hotel recently so I could attend my son's matriculation at the Lagos Business School over the weekend, the rooms were clean, central water heating system so I had hot water anytime I needed it, delicious hot meals, shuttle  service that took me and my family to the event. 24 hour light. had a really enjoyable stay. will definitely go back. perfect and family friendly.

I stayed at Gran Melia when I was at the Lagos Business School and this hotel is great if you have courses to attend at LBS. The rooms are neat, hotel is well maintained and staff are friendly. I will recommend this hotel. The wifi is good too, there's parking and a well maintained gym.

Good food,good services, fresh sashimi, would definitely recommend friends and families to eat here. Thumbs up  Mba kiki, mba citra,mba elsa,mba mitha ,mas kardini,mas cecep mas rosyid dan pak amri   You all the best

The hotel is situated in a good location and the environment inside the hotel is condusive. The rooms are cleans and well lit. The staffers are kind and welcoming people. The hotel rates is ok and within budget.  I will stay here again and again.

Stayed for three days on a business trip. The apartment is clean and food is good. The pricing of the hotel is in sync with the service, so don't get the feeling you're paying so much for little. The location is good for those who have business in that axis of Lagos.
